about_contribute.message: If you would like to report a problem or propose a new feature, please submit a request.

about_engine.message: Flashcontrol is built with the Adblock Plus 1.11 filter engine.

about_license.message: Flashcontrol is open source software, licensed under GPLv2.

allow_label.message: Allow websites to use flash plugins

allow_session.message: Allow this site until you exit Chrome

allow_site.message: Allow flash plugins on this site

choose_content.message: Let me choose when to allow flash plugins (recommended)

description.message: Stay in control of Flash content

filter_syntax.message: Flashcontrol uses the Adblock PlusÂ® filter syntax. To learn more about Adblock Plus (ABP) and the syntax visit these links:

filters_added.message: Create a filter that allows or blocks content by matching patterns in its URL. Learn more

flash_count.message: Show the number of flash players in the toolbar icon

green_icon.message: Show a green toolbar icon for 'allowed' sites

omnibox_desc.message: Give sites permission to use flash plugins.

reblock_buttons.message: Add a 'Close' button to each flash player

reblock_desc.message: Block content that you don't want to see.

whitelist_url.message: Add a URL so content can load the next time you visit the site.
